title: Rainbow of Elements
description: With 8 new elements, you can become a master of the elemental energies of: aether, awareness, light, shadow, spirit, time, vitality and void! In addition, you can find expansions for the elements of: air, earth, fire, metal, water, and wood as well as composite elements and expansions to the monk class and houses of perfection!

aether.label: Aether
aether.description: Related to the element of Aether.

chromatic.label: Chromatic
chromatic.description: If you used a different action with this trait since the beginning of your last turn, you can ignore the overflow trait of this impulse.
